Overview

- Release date: 2020, September
- Known as Alcatel 3X (2020)
- Android 10
- Size of 165 x 75 x 9.1 mm
- 186 grams

Display

- 6.52" HD 20:9 resolution (1600 x 720)
- IPS LCD
- Screen-to-body ratio: ~82.9%
- 269 ppi density

Memory

- 64 / 128 GB mass storage
- Expandable with microSD up to 512 GB (uses SIM slot)
- 4 / 6 GB RAM (LPDDR4X, 1600 MHz)

Battery

- Non-removable 5000 mAh battery
- (?) hours talk time (3G)

Sensors

✘ Gyroscope
✔ Accelerometer
✔ Proximity
✔ Compass
✘ Barometer

Processor

- MediaTek Helio P22 (8 Cortex-A53 up to 2 GHz)
- GPU: PowerVR GE8320

Cameras

- 16 MP (f/1.8 and sensor size 1/2.8"), 5 MP (f/2.2 and sensor size 1/5.0"), 2 MP (f/2.4) and 2 MP (f/2.4) main cameras
- 8 MP (f/2 and sensor size 1/4") front

✘ Image Stabilizer
✔ Main dual LED flash
✘ Front LED flash

Sound

- Loudspeaker(s): Mono
- Microphone(s): Stereo

Connectivity

- Supports LTE up to 150 Mbps
- Bluetooth 5.0
- Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n

✔ Headphone jack
✘ Type-C USB
✔ OTG USB
✔ FM Radio
✘ NFC
✘ eSIM
